column4: I just installed 6.10 and I have a intel pro wireless 3945 card, I am having trouble with network-manager-gnome... it installs, but I can't seem to find it now
oh, on my system? in the applications
no, because the wireless card is working right now
it should apear as an icon where the software updates are
maybe you should reinstall and if that fails trya reboot
I tried reinstalling in synaptic and rebooting
can you see the package now
sorry im not sure what's wrong
